/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with trees and power lines, stretches out into the distance. A few cars and a motorcycle are visible on the road, adding a touch of life to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
